entry.title: API - scheduled deletion of deprecated API routes (GET /order/catalog/formatted/cloud)
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 2, 2026, 09:00 - 09:02 UTC

Sep 17, 13:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our API endpoints (https://eu.api.ovh.com, https://ca.api.ovh.com).

Start time : 02/03/2026 09:00 UTC
End time : 02/03/2026 09:02 UTC
Maintenance : Scheduled deletion of deprecated API routes will be performed.
Impacted API routes: 

GET /order/catalog/formatted/cloud

Notes : The deprecated API routes are replaced by a new API route that provide the same level of features:

entry.title: [APAC][Customer Service] - Live Chat incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 25, 00:31 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Support offering, which is causing temporary issue while accessing the live chat APAC regions.

Please find the details:
Start time : 25/09/2025 00:06 UTC
Service impact : Live Chat is unreachable in the specified regions.
Customers impact : Customers cannot access live chat when they need to contact Support in APAC regions.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Workaround : In order to join the Support, customers can call Support directly.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Control panel & API] - Manager Incident Notification
entry.content:
Sep 24, 14:27 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Control panel & API has been resolved.

Start time : 23/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 24/09/2025 14:20 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 24, 08:42 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Control panel & API offer

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 23/09/2025 12:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The Manager from the Control panel & API has a malfunction.
Customers Impact : If users don't have rights to perform api calls to https://www.ovh.com/engine/apiv6/me/suggest/companyIdentificationNumbers due to IAM user restrictions, they will not be able to use the Manager .
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

Sep 24, 08:28 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Control panel & API offer.

Start time : 23/09/2025 12:00 UTC

We are currently experiencing an event affecting manager if user dont have rights to perform api calls to https://www.ovh.com/engine/apiv6/me/suggest/companyIdentificationNumbers due to IAM user restrictions.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible.

As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.
